title: Richard Eden for The Daily Mail
text: When he was Britain's consummate man about town, Tim Jefferies numbered top models Elle 'The Body' Macpherson, Claudia Schiffer and Sophie Dahl among his girlfriends. But the Mayfair gallery owner eventually settled down and declared that he was happy to abandon his bachelor days in favour of nappy changes and domesticity with his wife, Malin Johansson, a Swedish model 15 years his junior, and their two children. Now, the couple's marriage has hit the rocks 11 years after they exchanged vows at Blenheim Palace. ...read
description: Richard Eden for The Daily Mail Columnist Archive for MailOnline
